column1: His <subj> was a Spaniard and his <obj> was Marcela Gutiérrez.
Her <subj> was from Kottayam and her <obj> was from Palakkad.
His <subj> is Québécois and his <obj> is Algonquin.
She sported a "sultry" <obj> tuxedo with <subj> lapels.
Her <subj> is from Diyarbakır and her <obj> is from Kastamonu.
The opposite of <obj> chaining is <subj> chaining.
